channel.title: Bugged NPC's?
channel.description:
Hey everyone, as u can see, im a new poster please tell me if this is in the wrong section OK, so my server base was evolutionX, (BTW, I'm only twelve :D ) but the problem is, his NPC's were bugged ALOT! I tried to fix it, it worked, but whenever i do a command, they twitch again how can i fix these bugs? please help
Please PM me if ur willing to help!

please tell me if this is in the wrong section
OK, so my server base was evolutionX, (BTW, I’m only twelve ) but the problem is, his NPC’s were bugged ALOT!
I tried to fix it, it worked, but whenever i do a command, they twitch again
how can i fix these bugs? please help

Please PM me if ur willing to help![/quote]

ur 12 … why did you make that poll ? if you dont know how to work with delta its not my problem… but that makes you 10 times stupid…

item.title: Bugged NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote=“dragon39990, post:7, topic:336618”][quote author=pl0x15 link=topic=432986.msg3178791#msg3178791 date=1271113628]
Except for the poster, dragon, you are all idiots. He asked for simple help, not “i use delta” “its an easy fix” “they always do that” If its an easy fix, tell him how to freakin fix it!, if u use delta, good for frikin u. if they always do that, “no they don’t ur a F_ING idiot.” they may sometimes, but u can still fix.
[/quote]

Okay well, I was saying that if “Cow” thinks it’s an easy fix WHY DOESN’T HE TELL HIM HOW! I’m not saying all that other crap I was just getting the point out there that if you “know” you can fix the problem, why would you come to a post where they need YOUR help on THAT problem, and your just going to say “Thats an easy fix”[/quote]

He’s using delta.

Use my NPCHandler.java

Read full topic
